01: 💻 I like to keep my software updated. After days or weeks of being away, updating is the first thing I tend do when I get back.

03: 🍞 I make my own bread too.

09: 💻 This year I made the jump to Linux, replacing Windows. I still dual-boot though.
11: 🐈 🐈 🐈 With my girlfriend, we are the proud parents of 3 cats: Pluto, Shiva and Empanada.
12: 🎸 On average, I attend between 2 and 4 concerts per month.
13: 🔪 I love cooking. I try to make one new recipe every week.
15: ☕ Specialty coffee drinker. No milk. No sugar.
16: 🌐 I started browsing the web back in 1994. I don't believe I was ever the same again.
18: 👐 I'm a big fan of open-source and I believe in sharing knowledge.
19: 📽️ I love movies. They can be such a powerful medium.
20: 🥾 When traveling, I always prefer to walk than taking public transport (whenever possible). This way I get to discover new things, maybe see something funny along the way, or something otherwise hidden.
